data.text: “Winjuru ma, yaye un joka Jakobo,
un muluongoru ni weg dala maduongʼ
Ne akoro chon gik makoro osetimoregi,
Nimar nangʼeyo wich tekou;
Kuom mano, ne anyisou magi duto chon,
Isewinjo wechegi, rang-gi ane duto.
Gin gik mochwe sani, kendo mapok obudho;
Chutho ok osewinjo kata mana ngʼeyo,
Agengʼo mirimba nikech nyinga awuon;
Asepwodhou, to ok kaka ipwodho fedha,
Asetimo kamano kuom rito nyinga,
“Winjauru, yaye joka Jakobo in Israel ma aseluongo:
Lweta owuon ema ne oketo mise mar piny
“Chokreuru un duto mondo uwinji:
An, kendo en An adier, ema asewacho kamano;
“Sud machiegni koda mondo iwinj wachni:
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye, ma Jaresni,
Ka dine bed ni irito chikena,
Nyikwayi dine obedo mana ka kwoyo,
Wuoguru Babulon,
Kane otelonegi e thim, to riyo ne ok oloyogi;
Jehova Nyasaye owacho niya, “Jaricho to onge gi kwe.”
